channel.title: Open-Source on Funtechjunk
channel.description: Recent content in Open-Source on Funtechjunk

item.title: Apps that are not available on Google Playstore
item.description: 1.Popcorn Time img Popcorn Time is a multi-platform, free software BitTorrent client that includes an integrated media player. The application provides a free alternative to subscription-based video streaming services such as Netflix. Popcorn Time uses sequential downloading to stream video listed by several torrent websites, and third party trackers can also be added manually Download 2.Instander img Instander is an Open-source App which has more features and modified from original application
